attributes.action: Take action against incompetent rail companies
attributes.additional_details: South Western and Southern are main offenders but all networks should be investigated. It's an embarrassment to the nation.
attributes.background: Rail fares in the UK are some of the highest in the world. This wouldn't be a problem if we also had the best service in the world, but we don't. Constant delays/cancellations impact our wellbeing as well as our economy as we're missing time at work, which should motivate government to take action.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
